definitions.definition: The study of congenital malformations , their development, and people with them.
The study of the mechanisms , teratogenic agents, or teratogens , in bringing about malformations.
The study or cataloging of monsters .

main_definition: ( medicine ) The study of congenital malformations , their development, and people with them.
secondary_definitions: ( toxicology ) The study of the mechanisms , teratogenic agents, or teratogens , in bringing about malformations.
The study or cataloging of monsters .
